OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementSubleaseRe.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Sublease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementSubleaseRe.description: The amount of revenue recognized for the period under subleasing arrangements.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments, related to increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition (sale) of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherLoansAndLeas.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherLoansAndLeas.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for other changes, net, in the loan and lease balances held for investment purposes that are not separately disclosed. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireFederalHomeLoanBankStoc.label: Payments to Acquire Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
PaymentsToAcquireFederalHomeLoanBankStoc.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherLoansAndLeasesHeld.label: Payments to Acquire Other Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireOtherLoansAndLeasesHeld.description: Amount of cash outflow from purchases of loans and leases held-for-investment classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Proceeds from FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalHomeLoanBankSto.label: Proceeds from Sale of Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalHomeLoanBankSto.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

QualifiedAffordableHousingProjectInvestm.label: Qualified Affordable Housing Project Investments, Commitment
QualifiedAffordableHousingProjectInvestm.description: Amount of commitment or contingent commitments to qualified affordable housing project investments.

RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Payments of FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SecuritizationFinancialAssetForWhichTran.label: Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Financial Asset for which Transfer is Accounted as Sale, Gain (Loss) on Sale
SecuritizationFinancialAssetForWhichTran.description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

SeniorNotes.label: Senior Notes
SeniorNotes.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Additions
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.description: The value of new servicing assets, subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through purchases or from transfers of financial assets.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Amount
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueDisposals.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Disposals
ServicingAssetAtFairValueDisposals.description: Decrease in servicing assets subsequently measured at fair value resulting from conveyance of servicing rights to unrelated parties.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesInF.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Other Changes in Fair Value
ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesInF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Available for Grant
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The difference between the maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) authorized for issuance under the plan (including the effects of amendments and adjustments), and the sum of: 1) the number of shares (or other type of equity) already issued upon exercise of options or other equity-based awards under the plan; and 2) shares (or other type of equity) reserved for issuance on granting of outstanding awards, net of cancellations and forfeitures, if applicable.

ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, over Time
ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.label: Short-term Debt, Average Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, average borrowings during the period.

ShorttermDebtMaximumAmountOutstandingDur.label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
ShorttermDebtMaximumAmountOutstandingDur.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, the maximum amount borrowed at any time during the period.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Remainder of Fiscal Year
TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit.

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsS.label: Transfer of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sales, Amount Derecognized
TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsS.description: Amount of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction, at the date of derecognition.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Amount of deferred fees paid by borrowers and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRo.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

BankOwnedLifeInsurance.label: Bank Owned Life Insurance
BankOwnedLifeInsurance.description: The carrying amount of a life insurance policy on an officer, executive or employee for which the reporting entity (a bank) is entitled to proceeds from the policy upon death of the insured or surrender of the insurance policy.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

PaymentsForAffordableHousingPrograms.label: Payments for Affordable Housing Programs
PaymentsForAffordableHousingPrograms.description: Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).
